title: "AI is helping astronomers make new discoveries and learn about the universe faster than ever before"
excerpt: "The famous first image of a black hole just got two times sharper. A research team used artificial intelligence to dramatically improve upon its first image from 2019, which now shows the black hole at the center of the M87 galaxy as darker and bigger than the first image depicted."
